about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Winter 2020 Shop] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
Festive Lamppost
Log Cabin
Frosty Windows
Ye Olde Candle
Patchwork Deer Mount
Patchwork Bear Mount
Neon Gift Box (Animated)
Nutcracker
Grandfather Clock
Golden Star Tree
Festive Table
Festive Fireplace

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
